channel.title: I need help with a command thing
channel.description: i want to make a command that says to everyone something like you know when npc's talk they say it out loud well i want to do that but with a command. anyone help? :D

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Sorry it took so long, I went to get something to eat.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("victory")) { startAnimation(0x850); txt4 = "W00t I owned that f00l!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; }
